fig.label: Figure 1

caption.p: Urinary pH of rats treated with aqueous and 80% methanol extracts of the leaves of F. sur.

fig.attrib: Notes: Each value represents mean Â±SEM (n=6). Error bars indicate SEM. Analysis was performed by one-way ANOVA followed by Tukey's post hoc multiple comparison test; aagainst control, * p<0.05.
Abbreviations: DW, distilled water; NC, negative control; FURO, furosemide; FSAE, F. sur aqueous extract; FSME, F. sur methanol extract.
